body.description: Product Description Provides noticeable volume and bounce to fine, flat, and thin hair. Leaves an incredible shine and adds essential strength and lightweight moisture. Brand Story L’ANZA provides the only haircare products that heal the hair. Our award-winning products deliver complete Keratin protein replenishment. All formulas heal, seal and protect hair, providing unsurpassed health and shine.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: FORMULATED TO ENHANCE SHINE, VOLUME AND HEALTH L'ANZA's UNIQUE FORMULA This set of L'ANZA premium products is designed to free your hair from radical damage and prevent future split ends. L'ANZA Healing Volume products leave your hair with extra body and texture while keeping hair and scalp feeling and looking beautiful every day. MAJOR VOLUME, PERFECT DEFINITION Enjoy extra fullness and volume with the L'ANZA Healing Volume line, built specifically to eliminate flatness, lifelessness, and stiffness without taking from your hair bounce and movement. The products that actually make your hair thick! EXTRA KERATIN BOOST We made sure to add a boost of Keratin so you can enjoy thick, frizz-free, and shiny-smooth hair all day, every day. L'ANZA Healing Volume range is sulfate-free, preventing your hair from future breakage and damage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best hair care product!
reviews.reviewText: I love Lanza, this is my favorite shampoo of their products but I use many of the Lanza product and by far the best of the best that I’ve tried for my hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Changes the game.
reviews.reviewText: My hair has been dry, braking, and shedding badly. In the first week I notice a change in the feel. It was finally soft and smooth, no longer dry and brittle. The next couple weeks, I noticed short hairs that were caused by breakage growing. I’m not sure if I’m my head, but in the last month it has also felt thicker! Quite a bit of money for sure, but truly a little goes a long way for the shampoo and conditioner. To me it’s also worth the money to feel better about my hair. I do not want to live with thinning, dry hair, it’s too depressing. So, I will continue to buy. I love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super for Volume for Thin Hair
reviews.reviewText: I love everything about this shampoo. I am highly sensitive to scents, so often, I may love the functionality of a product, but the scent overwhelms me making it something I cannot use. This has a nice scent that doesn't linger with you all day and it provides volume to fair fine hair without drying it out or darkening the color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars No need for conditioner
reviews.reviewText: Just started using this shampoo. It lathers up well. And, I didn’t. need conditioner. I think my hair looks fuller but I’m not sure at this point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best shampoo ever
reviews.reviewText: I love this shampoo for my fine hair. It doesn’t weigh it down. Well worth the money.My only concern was the bottle wasn’t sealed and some of it leaked out( which had nothing to do with the product itself)

reviews.reviewTitle: Endlich ... ein Shampoo das hält was es verspricht
reviews.reviewText: Aufgrund eines Berichtes in einem meiner Lieblingsblogs habe ich diese brandneue Serie entdeckt. Ich bin fast 50 und leider derzeit unter hormonell bedingtem Haarausfall und altersbedingt dünner werdenden Haaren. Natürlich ersetzt das Shampoo keine indizierte HET enthält auch kein Minoxidil wie z.B. Regaine (das benutze ich zusätzlich und konnte damit den Haarausfall eindämmen). Zunächst wollte ich die Nourishing Serie kaufen da diese speziell für Leute mit dünner werdendem Haar sein soll. Soll Männern genauso passen wie Frauen. Dann habe ich mich allerdings für die Volume Serie entschieden da ich auf den Sofort Effekt gespannt war. Nach der Anwendung fühlen sich die Haare sofort dicker an, nach dem Styling habe ich das Empfinden dreimal so viel Haare auf dem Kopf zu haben. Eine teure Angelegenheit - aber für mich jeden Cent wert - der entsprechende Conditioner ergänzt das Programm, zusätzlich gibt es noch Spezial Treatments. Wenn ich dieses Produkt aufgebraucht habe werde ich mir vermutlich auch die Nourishing Serie ansehen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: Best hair care product for fine hair.
reviews.reviewText: I've used all shampoos for fine hair and this is the best. It doesn't require conditioner, it gives you a head full of thicker hair without showing your scalp. Amazing.
